article_title: Moncton council OKs rezoning for school, but with conditions for province
article_description: Moncton councillors were prepared to halt approval of a large new school after neighbours voiced concerns at a public hearing Monday about privacy  security and drainage
article_content: Moncton councillors were prepared to halt approval of a large new school after neighbours voiced concerns at a public hearing Monday about privacy  security and drainage Council ultimately approved the rezoning of vacant land at 620 McLaughlin Dr  from res   3494 chars
